title: Randy Bachman and Burton Cummings Are Back Together for 2020 Tour: Exclusive
description: Randy Bachman and Burton Cummings will share the land, or at least the stage again, this summer as the Guess Who duo hits the road for two dozen dates, mostly in their native Canada.
